testcase.brief: AP modify the tcp mss to 1414 when the syn/syn ack pkt is tunneled in tunnel access side.
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: INXP exist in two boxes
Test Procedure: 1. The TCP MSS is modified to 1414 for SYN in access side. Result 1 2. The TCP MSS is modified to 1414 when SYN-ACK in access. Result 1 3. The TCP Segment is not beyond 1414 so there should not be fragmentation for tcp traffic

step.desc: Disable dhcp client on interface mgt0
Enable dhcp client on interface mgt0
step.console: -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "interface mgt0 dhcp client"

-v "security-object FWtest" -v "security-object FWtest default-user-profile-attr 2" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}_1" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}_1" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}_1 security-object FWtest" -v "mobility-policy ttt inxp gre-tunnel to ${ap2.mgt0.ip} password 123" -v "user-profile fw qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan2} mobility-policy ttt attribute 2" -v "forwarding-engine tunnel tcp-mss-threshold enable" -v "forwarding-engine tunnel tcp-mss-threshold threshold-size 1414"

-v "security-object FWtest" -v "security-object FWtest default-user-profile-attr 2" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object FWtest" -v "mobility-policy ttt inxp gre-tunnel from ${ap1.mgt0.ip}/32 password 123" -v "user-profile fw qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan2} mobility-policy ttt attribute 2" -v "forwarding-engine tunnel tcp-mss-threshold enable" -v "forwarding-engine tunnel tcp-mss-threshold threshold-size 1414"
